H0.text: Weight is the trait most influenced by environment.

H1.text: Hair color is the trait most influenced by environment.

H2.text: Blood type is the trait most influenced by environment.

H3.text: Handedness is the trait most influenced by environment.

A4.text: Maternal dietary supplementation with genistein (250 mg/kg) have epigenetic changes affecting expression of the agouti gene, which affects their fur color

A5.text: Maternal dietary supplementation with genistein (250 mg/kg) have epigenetic changes affecting expression of the agouti gene, which affects their weight
